channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 07:29 Alarm lifted in Kyiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 07:29 Alarm lifted in Kyiv region. Follow further messages. #Kyiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 07:28 Alarm lifted in Cherkasy region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 07:28 Alarm lifted in Cherkasy region. Follow further messages. #Cherkasy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 07:06 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 07:06 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 06:59 The threat of shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Follow the news for further updates.

item.title: 🟡 06:09 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyan district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community
